column1: * 1934 - J.R.R. Tolkiens poem "The Adventures of Tom Bombadil (poem)" is published in The Oxford Magazine.

column2: the Appendix B lists the two events of  at 14 February. Since it is clear from the narrative that the latter event occurred one day before departure on 16 February
column3: this causes a problem in the chronology. Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull decided to fix the Tale of Years so that the Mirror of Galadriel-sequence happened on 15 February. The return to life of Gandalf was also moved to today
